In general, the game turned out to be cool, I really like it, I play it every day.

Everyone who says that in this game is a bad community, just do not pay attention to those who insult
you, play for your pleasure and do not pay attention to cattle, do not take everything to heart, you will still not see them anymore at the end of the match.

As for shooting, there is a controversial issue, you need to get used to it if you have played shooters such as
Insurgensy, counter strike: 1.6, counter strike: source and similar games.
Yes, bullets can fly up, or you can’t hit the enemy at all, but this is due to the Internet or the server on which you are playing.


And there’s nothing to talk about donat, it’s all bad with that, it can be called "pumping money from the wallet."
There is one plus in this, if you get an expensive drop in MM (with a very small chance), you can sell it at a good price, and buy yourself a good game in Steam, etc. Also in the donate there is no need to buy it, because it does not give any advantage in the battle with opponents.


The graphics are pretty good here, even for 2020, the game will go even on weak computers, the game can currently compete with many newcomers, many video bloggers shoot the game on both Twitch and Youtube.
